sentence.Network_en: The danger of motorcycling also helps account for many people's low opinion of the sport.

sentence.Network_en: Jon was introduced to motorcycling by his father.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲使乔恩了解了摩托车运动.
骑摩托车是一项危险的运动.
